report.title: Red Rock Incense
report.author: Deez
report.bodytext: I had a feeling it was fake when I first saw the red rocks. Wrong color, wrong smell, wrong texture. I knew I would be the right one to test it, because my friends were all convinced of it's authenticity. /n /n I currently take @ 100 mg of morphine (Ms Contin) daily. It had been almost 24 hours since my last dose. I was out of pills, and I was starting to hurt all over. I told my friend to give me some to test because if it was real I would quit hurting. Make sense? You might have to be a junkie to understand. /n /n Anyway, I smoked 1/2 a gram, and my pain never subsided. Test complete. There is no opium or opiate derivatives in these red rocks. Sorry to all who got got.
